column1: Little Goat Diner////Been there a few times back in 2013
column2: during that time that I was building a former (Bar Mas).....Resently went up there for lunch and ordered a Burger
column3: oh boy that was one yummmy burger. Hip place
column4: kind of on the cute side...like the open kitchen concept....with sitting in front of it. I would definitely recommend this place to everyone
column5: actually been to Goat and a Girl
column6: and Little Goat was my favorite from the two... :)
